com.foreach.across.core

Class AcrossVersionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.AcrossVersionInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicAcrossModule.DynamicAcrossVersionInfo

    public class AcrossVersionInfo
extends Object
    Contains version information for an AcrossEntity.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      • load

        public static AcrossVersionInfo load(Class<?> clazz)
        Retrieve an AcrossVersionInfo instance for a given class. This attempts to read the Manifest of the jar/war the class belongs to, and parses common attributes from it. This method will never return null but will return a special instance even if no version information could be loaded.
        Parameters:
        clazz - instance
        Returns:
        version info instance
